title: (x) Gnostech italic humanist sans - Myriad {Marc O}
content:
Hi Folks,  
This sample was sent to me for an ID and I said the closest I could find was [FF Transit Back Positive Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185214/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11004.8.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Gnostech&sampleSize=48). Then I suggested graphic widening to get closer, but I know how we all hate those answers, so I was hoping someone might recognize the font.

Thanks, - Mike

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gnostech.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185214/http:/typophile.com/files/gnostech.gif) | 26.24 KB |
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
Myriad Semibold Italic, stretched to around 110%, is my guess.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/gnostech_myriad_4086.gif)

I agree Marc. I think youâ€™ve got it. Good work.

Thanks very much.

- Mike Yanega
